ISSUE.TITLE: Richeditor sets zero height when saving locales
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: Admin area -> Edit message template > -Create an additional language besides the default english > -Edit any message template in the backoffice, introducing data in the BODY of any locale > -Select "Save and continue edit" while the locale TAB is active > -The body textarea height is set to zero rather than the correct height for the content > -If the "Standard" tab is active when saving, this problem does not occur > Expected behavior: After editing a template with multiple languages and clicking on ""Save and continue edit" while on any locale TAB, the BODY of the message should show the correct height > > Actual behavior: if a locale TABs is selected while clicking the "save and continue edit", it results in a height of zero for the BODY textarea; works fine if the "Standard" tab is currently selected. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/en/boards/topic/89501/admin-area-message-templates-richeditor-sets-zero-height-when-saving-locales
